text: @realDonaldTrump You disgusting loser! Please, go inhale deeply in a Covid-19 ward.  Oh, wait.  You're way too much of a chicken-shit coward to do that.  One way or the other, I hope you get the   virus that you failed to contain and that you go out gasping, more than you already do.
